title: Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Health - Medical Checks / Provider
description: The provider is the person who treats the patient.

givenName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person.

familyName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Family name. In the U.S., the last name of a Person.

medicalSpecialty.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A medical specialty of the provider. Model: 'https://schema.org/MedicalSpecialty'

hospitalAt.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Place where the physician works. Model:  'https://schema.org/Hospital'
